name: host-fulstack
description: Hosting the Udacity Udagram Full Stack Application on AWS.

scripts.backend:build: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.backend:test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.frontend:build: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.frontend:test: cd udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install

author: Amrwaa
